title: standnews (立場新聞) should have the English version?

replies.msg:
We all know how good the standnews is but we would also like to share this great media with people from all corners of the world, especially when the mainstream foreign-facing news were mostly controlled by CCP and its allies such as Bloomberg and SCMP. Reuters may be better but after all they didn’t report the whole thing for some reasons.

So I would like the standnews to have the official English version so that friends from all countries can benefit from it

Agree

However If they do have resources to hire a journalist who speak native English.. they would do that I guess.
Maybe the AppleDaily can take this better.
佢地一早開咗 但唔多文章

佢地呢加有人將立場長篇專題譯做英文
通常係中文版出左後二日後出
